bs-saferedit-desc: Provides warnings if other users are editing the page
bs-saferedit-pref-interval: Interval for lookup for concurrent editings:
bs-saferedit-pref-interval-help: Sets the time in seconds for checking if another person is editing the page.
bs-saferedit-pref-shownameofeditinguser-: Shows the users who are currently editing the page as a hint on top of the page.
